typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersInputSource
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as string,
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(output(
		productid as string,
		title as string,
		unitsinstock as string,
		unitprice as string,
		itemdiscount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Products
source(output(
		CityId as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CapitalCities
OrdersInputSource, Customers join(customer == customerid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrdersAndCustomers
OrdersAndCustomers, Products join(product == productid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OrderCustomersProducts
